blogs.title: Journal Blog is Here
blogs.body: The Journal 3 blog has been greatly improved and it now comes with the most advanced set of typography tools, including custom drop-cap support as well as optional newspaper-like fluid columns. You can break up the page in up to 4 columns and change the configuration per breakpoint for the best article layout on any screen width. The Journal blog i..
